General.Name: Kinder Morgan Kansas Inc.
General.Description: Kinder Morgan is one of the largest pipeline transportation and energy storage companies in North America with approximately 37,000 miles of pipelines and 180 terminals. We transport, store and handle energy products like natural gas, refined petroleum products, crude oil, ethanol, coal and carbon dioxide (CO<sub>2</sub>). These products are essential for generating electricity, heating homes, powering cars and much more.
General.Address: 500 Dallas Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
